title: SET U-vs-x graph set - force on particle A

content.question: When Particle <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is at <math alttext="x equals 0.15 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>, what is the approximate magnitude of the force exerted on Particle <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> by Particle <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
